overview: From 2025-06-07 to 2025-06-08, elizaos/eliza had 22 new PRs (16 merged), 2 new issues, and 8 active contributors.

topIssues.title: CLI does not load/register dependencies from plugins
topIssues.author: lalalune
topIssues.body:
Plugins now define dependencies. These dependencies are loaded automatically when we load the plugin.

Tests and startup should make sure these dependencies are loaded

https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/pull/4994

I made this and it works for tests but I suspect many edge case issues

One major change is we should consider testDependencies as separate from regular required dependnecies

We should also make sure that deps are deduplicated through, so we don't load the same dep from different plugins for example

topIssues.title: When testing default plugins (bootstrap, sql, etc) get "unable to register again" error
topIssues.author: lalalune
topIssues.body:
When testing default plugins (bootstrap, sql, etc) get "unable to register again" error

To test: run 'bun run test' in any of these repos

This would be harmless but can be annoying with race condition on build for testing while developing

topPRs.title: feat: Split types.ts into granular files
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body:
This PR splits the gigantic types.ts into logical and granular sections

Nice for agentic search etc

topPRs.title: feat: Load dependencies when loading plugins
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body:
This PR loads dependencies from the 'dependencies' list in the Plugin

This enables plugins to import other plugins and for tests to pass when running them

We need to verify that this will work correctly with a variety of plugins and edge cases on main when actually running plugins

topPRs.title: feat(client): Add split button component and improve character form UI
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## ðŸš€ Features

### New Split Button Component
- **Reusable SplitButton component** with dropdown functionality for grouping related actions
- **Configurable options** with labels, descriptions, and individual click handlers
- **Variant support** for default and destructive styling (red for dangerous actions)
- **Controlled/uncontrolled** value management with proper state handling
- **Accessibility features** with ARIA labels and keyboard navigation support

### Character Form UI Improvements
- **Replaced individual import/export buttons** with a clean split button interface
- **Replaced individual stop/delete buttons** with a destructive split button for dangerous actions
- **Better organization** of related actions in intuitive dropdown menus
- **Improved mobile responsiveness** with better section label truncation (8 chars instead of 3-4)
- **Cleaner layout** with reduced button clutter and better visual hierarchy

### Component Updates
- **Updated Button component** to latest design system with improved focus states, shadows, and variants
- **Updated DropdownMenu component** to latest Radix UI version (v2.1.15) with enhanced styling and behavior
- **Enhanced focus management** and pointer event handling for better accessibility
- **Consistent styling** across all UI components

### UX Enhancements
- **Fixed toast auto-dismiss timing** from 1000 seconds to 3 seconds for proper user feedback
- **Descriptive dropdown options** with labels and helpful descriptions
- **Maintained all existing functionality** while improving organization and discoverability
- **Better visual feedback** for destructive actions with appropriate color coding

## ðŸŽ¯ Benefits

1. **Improved User Experience**: Related actions are now logically grouped, reducing cognitive load
2. **Cleaner Interface**: Significant reduction in button clutter while maintaining full functionality
3. **Better Mobile Support**: Enhanced responsive behavior with improved label handling
4. **Enhanced Accessibility**: Proper ARIA labels, focus management, and keyboard navigation
5. **Consistent Design Language**: All components now follow the latest design system standards
6. **Better Feedback**: Toast notifications now behave as expected with proper auto-dismiss

## ðŸ§ª Testing Verified

- âœ… All existing import/export functionality preserved and working
- âœ… Stop/Delete agent actions work as expected with proper confirmation
- âœ… Split button dropdown interactions work smoothly
- âœ… Mobile responsiveness improved across different screen sizes
- âœ… Toast notifications auto-dismiss after 3 seconds
- âœ… Keyboard navigation and accessibility features functional
- âœ… No breaking changes to existing workflows

## ðŸ“± UI/UX Improvements

### Before:
- Multiple scattered buttons for related actions
- Inconsistent styling across components
- Poor mobile label truncation (3-4 chars)
- Toast notifications never auto-dismissed (1000s timeout)

### After:
- Clean split buttons grouping related actions
- Consistent modern design system
- Better mobile labels (8 chars with better truncation)
- Proper toast auto-dismiss (3s timeout)
- Descriptive dropdown options with helpful context

## ðŸ”§ Technical Details

### New Files:
- `packages/client/src/components/split-button.tsx` - Main split button component

### Modified Files:
- `packages/client/src/components/character-form.tsx` - Integrated split buttons
- `packages/client/src/components/ui/button.tsx` - Updated to latest design system
- `packages/client/src/components/ui/dropdown-menu.tsx` - Updated to latest Radix UI
- `packages/client/src/hooks/use-toast.ts` - Fixed auto-dismiss timing
- `packages/client/package.json` - Updated Radix UI dependency

### Dependencies:
- Updated `@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu` from v2.1.6 to v2.1.15

This enhancement significantly improves the user experience while maintaining full backward compatibility and adding no breaking changes to existing functionality.

completedItems.title: fix: resolve env command interactive mode and flag inconsistencies
completedItems.body:
### Problem

Three critical issues in `elizaos env` command causing unreliable environment management:

1. **Infinite Loop**: `elizaos env interactive -y` loops forever, requiring Ctrl+C to exit
2. **Flag Logic Bug**: `elizaos env list

completedItems.title: Fix/plugins command empty string validation and help clarity
completedItems.body:
## Problem
- Empty strings in `elizaos plugins add ""` would trigger fuzzy search matching, installing random plugins (e.g., "plugin-0g")
- Help text for `plugins list` didn't clearly indicate that v1.x plugins are shown by default


completedItems.title: Fix CLI update from npm 1.0.5 to bun 1.0.6 by auto-migrating installations
completedItems.body:
# Fix CLI update from npm <1.0.5 to bun 1.0.6 by auto-migrating installations

## Problem

Users with npm-installed CLI version <1.0.5 cannot update to version 1.0.6+ because ElizaOS switched from npm to bun as the primary package manag

Focused primarily on code modifications with 29 files changed (+572/-330 lines) and maintained a consistent activity pattern with 23 commits.

Active with 14 commits, focusing primarily on feature work and modifying 98 files (+22646/-23502 lines).
